physical_appearance:\The image shows a poster and it has a white background. The poster has a border that is red and made out of floral patterns. At the centre of the square poster
 there are four large Chinese characters in multiple colours with the same floral patterns
 placed in a two by two diagonal alignment. At the lower left hand side of the square poster

metadata.title_text: Young Songwriters Society Xinyao festival poster Young Songwriters Society Xinyao festival poster 1990
metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a poster and it has a white background. The poster has a border that is red and made out of floral patterns. At the centre of the square poster, there are four large Chinese characters in multiple colours with the same floral patterns, placed in a two by two diagonal alignment. At the lower left hand side of the square poster, there are several lines of Chinese characters and several numbers denoting telephone numbers. The words ""Kallang Theatre"" are also stated. At the bottom centre of the square poster
